p: The seventh edition of the Chinese Clinical Guidance for COVID-19 Pneumonia Diagnosis and Treatment published by China National Health Commission on 4 March 2020 included tocilizumab as an option for patients with severe COVID-19, extensive lung lesions, and elevated IL-6 levels [ 90]. This followed reports of positive outcomes from the use of tocilizumab to control dangerous lung inflammation in 21 patients with severe COVID-19 in China [ 91].
